name: Brico Laïka
description:
You should have seen it coming, first Laïka, now you. Abandoned in your space station, your goal is to endlessly maintain your home by fixing different technical problems. You will wander in zero G, armed with you trusty tools, but be mindful that they float around like you do.

Controls:

Camera: Right joystick
Player moves: Left joystick
Laser pointer: to aim object
X: Grab/Release left hand object
B: Grab/Release right hand object Right/Left Trigger: Use object
LS: Tilt move left
RS: Tilt move right

Tip:
The object to fix are square form metal plates of different colors
